abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you gain temporary Armor and may Move up to 2.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: At the start of each ally's turn, that ally may Move up to 2.
abilities.trigger: at the start of each ally's turn

actions.name: Follow My Lead
actions.desc:
You may move 1, then deal 1 damage to an enemy within range. An ally you can see (other than yourself) may move 1, then deal 1 damage to an enemy within their range.
6+: You may move 1, then deal 1 damage to an enemy within range. An ally you can see (other than yourself) may move 1, then deal 1 damage to an enemy within their range.
